data.name: Zombie Army 4: Undercover Marie Outfit
data.detailed_description:
In the French Resistance, Marie was a master of disguise! She could infiltrate any party, take out her targets and get out without anyone ever noticing. Of course, in an undead apocalypse disguises aren’t really necessary – but who’s going to tell her?
This bundle contains one character outfit and two headgear variants.
data.about_the_game:
In the French Resistance, Marie was a master of disguise! She could infiltrate any party, take out her targets and get out without anyone ever noticing. Of course, in an undead apocalypse disguises aren’t really necessary – but who’s going to tell her?
This bundle contains one character outfit and two headgear variants.
data.short_description: In the French Resistance, Marie was a master of disguise! She could infiltrate any party, take out her targets and get out without anyone ever noticing.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit / Windows 7 64-bit*
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 (or AMD equivalent)
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 1030 2GB (or AMD equivalent)
  • Additional Notes: *Windows 7 64-bit version 7601 supported only via the Vulkan launcher option.
